title: Farmer
body:
Hello Tinman.
<<if visited("Postperson.AskForPost") && !visited("Farmer.GivePost")>>
    [[The messenger birds don't feel well.|Farmer.GivePost]]
<<else>>
    Thanks for getting the mail earlier.
    I hope the judges like Emmas poem!
<<endif>>

title: Farmer.GivePost
body:
Oh dear, I wish I could help them.
But sadly my specialty are the bigger animals,
So I can do right now is wish them best of luck.
I assume you're here to get my mail then?
It's a poem Emma wrote for a contest,
can you imagine how proud I am of her??
